languages.text: "Но ты бы разрешил{mf||а}, если бы видел{mf||а} ее такой, какой вижу я. Она — буря. Она — несчастье. Тебе не нужно это подле себя, Домин. Верь мне".
"But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is tempest. She is woe. You do not want this by your side, Domin. Believe me."
languages.original_text: "Но ты бы разрешил{mf||а}, если бы видел{mf||а} ее такой, какой вижу я. Она — буря. Она — несчастье. Тебе не нужно это подле себя, Домин. Верь мне".

traits.locale_text: "But you would give it if you saw her the way I see her. She is a tempest. She is a disaster. You do not want this by your side, Enim. Trust me."
"But you would give it if you saw her the way I see her. She is a tempest. She is a disaster. You do not want this by your side, Enim. Trust me."
"But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is a tempest. She is a disaster. You do not want this by your side, Enim. Trust me."
"But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is a tempest. She is a disaster. You do not want this by your side, Enim. Trust me."
"But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is tempest. She is woe. You do not want this by your side, Domin. Believe me."
"But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is tempest. She is woe. You do not want this by your side, Domin. Believe me."

languages.text: « Mais si vous la voyiez comme je la vois... Elle est la tempête. Elle apporte le malheur. Vous n'en voulez pas à vos côtés, Domin. Croyez-moi. »
languages.original_text: "But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is tempest. She is woe. You do not want this by your side, Domin. Believe me."

traits.locale_text: « Mais si vous la voyiez comme je la vois... Elle est la tempête. Elle apporte le malheur. Vous n'en voulez pas à vos côtés, Domin. Croyez-moi. »

languages.text: «Si la viera como yo, lo haría. Es una tempestad. Es dolor. No la quiere tener a su lado así, Domin. Créame».
languages.original_text: "But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is tempest. She is woe. You do not want this by your side, Domin. Believe me."

traits.locale_text: «Si la viera como yo, lo haría. Es una tempestad. Es dolor. No la quiere tener a su lado así, Domin. Créame».

languages.text: 「でも、私と同じように彼女を見れたら、あなただって…彼女は嵐、災いなの。ドミン、あなたの側には必要ない。私を信じて」
languages.original_text: "But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is tempest. She is woe. You do not want this by your side, Domin. Believe me."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、私と同じように彼女を見れたら、あなただって…彼女は嵐、災いなの。ドミン、あなたの側には必要ない。私を信じて」

languages.text: “可如果您能站在我的角度看待她，您会这么做的。她是风暴，她是灾祸。您绝不会希望这样的人在您身边，秘者，相信我。”
languages.original_text: "But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is tempest. She is woe. You do not want this by your side, Domin. Believe me."

traits.locale_text: “可如果您能站在我的角度看待她，您会这么做的。她是风暴，她是灾祸。您绝不会希望这样的人在您身边，秘者，相信我。”

languages.text: "Aber wenn Ihr sie so gesehen hättet wie ich, dann schon. Sie ist Sturm. Sie ist Leid. Ihr wollt so etwas nicht an Eurer Seite, Domin. Glaubt mir."
languages.original_text: "But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is tempest. She is woe. You do not want this by your side, Domin. Believe me."

traits.locale_text: "Aber wenn Ihr sie so gesehen hättet wie ich, dann schon. Sie ist Sturm. Sie ist Leid. Ihr wollt so etwas nicht an Eurer Seite, Domin. Glaubt mir."

languages.text: "Ancak onu benim gözümden görseydiniz izin verirdiniz. Fırtınanın, kederin ta kendisi o. Böyle bir şeyi yanınızda istemezsiniz Domin. Bana inanın."
languages.original_text: "But if you saw her the way I see her, you would. She is tempest. She is woe. You do not want this by your side, Domin. Believe me."
